function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Policy variables at a more granular level than infection data","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the effects of policies on infection growth rates","Mitigation":"Collect more spatially granular infection data to align with policy variables","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Limited quantity of data available","Impact":"Reduced accuracy of model predictions","Mitigation":"Conduct future studies with more data to identify important nonlinearities or interactions between policies","Technologies":"Big data analytics, data collection tools","People":"Researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, data organizations"},{"Description":"Non-normal distribution of residuals","Impact":"Potential bias in the estimation of uncertainty over parameters","Mitigation":"Use robust standard errors robust to error clustering at the day level","Technologies":"Statistical modeling software","People":"Statisticians, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, statistical organizations"}]}
